segments.text: I just wanted to congratulate you ! I mean , it was a good race and you deserve to win .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well ... thanks , Marcia.It ' s very nice of you to say so . I mean ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was that final sprint ! You were great ! Really !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you really think so ? I mean , was I ? Er ... you ... must be disappointed .
segments.speaker: S2
